languages.text: "Почему бы и нет? Ты ведь наверняка догадываешься. Кунрад Войгтвир фон Валанциус. Родная кровь... жаль, что только он из всей вашей династии достаточно смел, чтобы отбросить догмы, которыми нас потчевали с детства!"

"Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"
languages.original_text: "Почему бы и нет? Ты ведь наверняка догадываешься. Кунрад Войгтвир фон Валанциус. Родная кровь... жаль, что только он из всей вашей династии достаточно смел, чтобы отбросить догмы, которыми нас потчевали с детства!"

traits.locale_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire House who was brave enough to cast away the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

"Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire House who was brave enough to cast away the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

"Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

"Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

languages.text: “有何不可呢？我相信你已经猜到那个人是谁了。他就是昆拉德·维特威尔·冯·瓦兰修斯，是你自己的族人……在你的家族中，他是唯一一个敢于舍弃那些从小就被灌输的教条的人，真是可惜！”
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: “有何不可呢？我相信你已经猜到那个人是谁了。他就是昆拉德·维特威尔·冯·瓦兰修斯，是你自己的族人……在你的家族中，他是唯一一个敢于舍弃那些从小就被灌输的教条的人，真是可惜！”

languages.text: 「ふん。もう察しはついているだろう。クンラッド・ボイドヴィア・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の血族だ。子どものころから教え込まれてきた教義を捨てるほどの勇気を持つ者は、残念ながらお前たちの一族では彼だけだったというわけだ！」
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: 「ふん。もう察しはついているはずだろう。クンラッド・ボイドヴィア・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前たちの血族だ…残念ながら、お前たちの一族で、子どものころより食わされてきた教義を捨てされるほどの勇気を持つ者は、彼だけだったというわけだ！」
「ふん。もう察しはついているだろう。クンラッド・ボイドヴィア・フォン・ヴァランシウス。お前の血族だ。子どものころから教え込まれてきた教義を捨てるほどの勇気を持つ者は、残念ながらお前たちの一族では彼だけだったというわけだ！」

languages.text: "Warum nicht? Ihr habt bestimmt schon eine Ahnung. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Euer eigenes Blut ... Eine Schande, dass nur einer aus Eurem gesamten Haus den Mut hatte, die Dogmen abzulegen, die uns seit der Kindheit eingetrichtert wurden!"
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: "Warum nicht? Ihr habt bestimmt schon eine Ahnung. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Euer eigenes Blut ... Eine Schande, dass nur einer aus Eurem gesamten Haus den Mut hatte, die Dogmen abzulegen, die uns seit der Kindheit eingetrichtert wurden!"

languages.text: « Pourquoi pas ? Je suis sûr que vous avez déjà votre petite idée. Nul autre que Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Votre propre sang... Quel dommage qu'il ait été le seul dans toute votre maison à avoir eu le courage de se libérer des dogmes dont on nous abreuve dès le plus jeune âge ! »
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi pas ? Je suis sûr que vous avez déjà votre petite idée. Nul autre que Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Votre propre sang... Quel dommage qu'il ait été le seul dans toute votre maison à avoir eu le courage de se libérer des dogmes dont on nous abreuve dès le plus jeune âge ! »

languages.text: «¿Por qué no? Sé que ya lo sospechas: Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Tu propia sangre... ¡Es una lástima que sea el único de toda tu casa con la valentía necesaria para abandonar los dogmas que nos han inculcado desde niños!».
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no? Sé que ya lo sospechas: Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Tu propia sangre... ¡Es una lástima que sea el único de toda tu casa con la valentía necesaria para abandonar los dogmas que nos han inculcado desde niños!».

languages.text: "Hayhay. Eminim aklına biri gelmiştir zaten. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Kendi soyundan biri. Koca hanende, bize çocukluktan beri dikte edilen dogmaları bir kenara atma cesaretine sahip tek kişinin o olması ne yazık!"
languages.original_text: "Why not? I'm sure you have an inkling already. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Your own blood... A shame that he is the only one in your entire house who was brave enough to cast off the dogmas we've been fed since childhood!"

traits.locale_text: "Hayhay. Eminim aklına biri gelmiştir zaten. Kunrad Voigtvir von Valancius. Kendi soyundan biri. Koca hanende, bize çocukluktan beri dikte edilen dogmaları bir kenara atma cesaretine sahip tek kişinin o olması ne yazık!"
